# <a name="permanently-delete-email-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="2b29c-102">Trajno brisanje e-pošte na servisu Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2b29c-102">Permanently delete email in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2b29c-103">Ako želite izbrisati e-poštu ili isprazniti ulaznu poštu, učinite sljedeće:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2b29c-103">If you want to delete email or empty your inbox:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="2b29c-104">Odaberite poruke koje želite izbrisati (ili odaberite kružnicu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2b29c-104">Select the messages you want to delete (or select the circle</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="2b29c-105">pokraj **mape Ulazna pošta** pri vrhu popisa poruka odaberite sve poruke u ulaznoj pošti).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2b29c-105">next to **Inbox** at the top of your message list to select all messages in your inbox).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="2b29c-106">Pri vrhu stranice odaberite **Izbriši** (za cijelu mapu **praznu mapu**ili **ispraznite fokusiranu**  /  **praznu drugu** ako ste omogućili fokusiranu ulaznu poštu).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2b29c-106">At the top of the page, select **Delete** (for the whole folder **Empty folder**, or **Empty Focused** / **Empty Other** if you have Focused Inbox enabled).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="2b29c-107">Da biste očistili sve izbrisane poruke e-pošte, otvorite [mapu Izbrisane stavke](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) i odaberite **prazna mapa**, a zatim odaberite stavke koje se **mogu oporaviti** pri vrhu stranice, a zatim ponovno odaberite **Isprazni mapu** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2b29c-107">To purge all your deleted email, open your [Deleted Items folder](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) and select **Empty folder**, then select **Recoverable items** at the top of the page and select **Empty folder** again.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2b29c-108">Dodatne informacije potražite u odjeljku [Brisanje e-pošte na servisu Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2b29c-108">To learn more, read [Delete email in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
